{"id":459113446,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 3 months","timestamp":1613970315,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/459113446/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Bits","memory":"6.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    uint32_t reverseBits(uint32_t n) {\n        vector<int> bi;\n        uint32_t sum=1;\n        long long pro=1;\n        while(n!=0){\n            bi.emplace_back(n%2);\n            n/=2;\n        }\n        pro=pow(2,32-bi.size());\n        for(int i=bi.size()-1;i>=0;i--){\n            sum+=pro*bi[i];\n            pro*=2;\n        }\n        return sum-1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-bits"}
